thread.title: NHL notes: Expansion process update; Blackhawks get revenge - NHL
thread.title_full: NHL notes: Expansion process update; Blackhawks get revenge - NHL - SI.com

author: Allan Muir
title: NHL notes: Expansion process update; Blackhawks get revenge - NHL
text:
by Allan Muir Twitter Email Posted: Wed Sep. 30, 2015
After three phases of due diligence, the NHL is still playing coy about its process for adding one or more expansion teams at some point in the future.
Commissioner Gary Bettman said there was “no predetermined outcome” after the league’s executive committee heard presentations from expansion hopefuls Las Vegas and Quebec City on Tuesday.
NHL Las Vegas, Quebec City move one step closer to NHL expansion dream by Allan Muir
